channel.title: Policy & Security Think Tank Updates
channel.description: Custom RSS feed from CSIS, CFR, and other policy institutions

item.title: Fireside Discussion with Jacob Helberg, Under Secretary of State for Economic Affairs, and Congressman John Moolenaar, Chairman, Select Committee on China
item.description: Under Secretary of State for Economic Affairs Jacob Helberg and Rep. John Moolenaar, Chairman of the House Select Committee on China, joined the CSIS Critical Minerals Security Program for a fireside discussion on securing U.S. mineral supply chains.

item.title: Keynote Address by Howard Lutnick, U.S. Secretary of Commerce
item.description: U.S. Secretary of Commerce Howard Lutnick delivered a keynote address at the CSIS Critical Minerals Security Program’s Government-Industry Dialogue on Security Critical Mineral Supply.
